casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Melvin HUNT. No. 400P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2008. Haral E. Carlin, Fayetteville, for Hunt. *466L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of September 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2008."
